fast-with-mc-desc:
Skip the queue.
Maximise your time to relax,
shop and dine in the airport.
airport-security-ft-desc-1: As a valued Mastercard cardholder, you have access to Airport Security Fast Track service worldwide via the Mastercard Travel Experiences website or app.
airport-security-ft-desc-2: Fast Track allows passengers to have preferential access to a dedicated lane straight to the security checkpoint, speeding up the checkpoint process.
airport-security-ft-desc-3: Simply register with your eligible Mastercard card to get your journey off to a great start.
how-it-works-desc-1: Book your tickets in advance via the Mastercard Travel Experiences website or app.
how-it-works-desc-2: Use your eligible free Fast Track trips or pay using your Mastercard card.
how-it-works-desc-3: Receive your eTicket via email or in the app and show at the Airport Fast Track lane to gain access.
select-airport-desc-1: Indicates airports where FREE Fast Track passes can be used.
select-airport-desc-2: Indicates airport where Fast Track passes are only available to buy.
eligible-for-free-ft-pass: Eligible for free Fast Track pass
get-app-desc: Get the app to enjoy your airport experience with us.
accept-cookie-desc: We use cookies to offer you a better experience, analyze site traffic, and serve targeted advertisements. By continuing to use this website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our {0}.
img-alt-6: Download the Mastercard Travel Experiences app
